mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crowd_qna_#{crowdId}( crowd_qna_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , crowd_id INT default #{crowd_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL , qna_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , qna_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , published_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , is_deleted BOOL default false );
mapper.select: SELECT crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId , user_id AS userId, qna_title AS qnaTitle , qna_content AS qnaContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt , is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_#{crowd_id} ORDER BY crowd_qna_id DESC

SELECT crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId , user_id AS userId, qna_title AS qnaTitle , qna_content AS qnaContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt , is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_#{crowdId} WHERE is_deleted = false ORDER BY crowd_qna_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId , user_id AS userId, qna_title AS qnaTitle , qna_content AS qnaContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt , is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_#{crowdId} WHERE crowd_qna_id = #{crowdQnaId}
